### R libraries

- The [Tidyverse](https://tidyverse.org) is a collection of libaries implementing a principled approach to data analysis.
- [Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org) is a collection of libraries focused on biological data analysis.
- [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/reference/)
- [cowplot](https://wilkelab.org/cowplot/)
- [ggthemes](https://yutannihilation.github.io/allYourFigureAreBelongToUs/ggthemes/)

## Statistics

- [Practical Statistics for Data Scientists](https://github.com/gedeck/practical-statistics-for-data-scientists) covers several fundamental concepts with code for both R and Python.
- [Modern Statistics for Modern Biology](https://www.huber.embl.de/msmb/) is written by two leading figures in computational biology and contains several examples using Bioconductor.
- [Statistics for Biologists](https://www.nature.com/collections/qghhqm) is a collection of articles on statistical topic.
